magic paths [mpath]: E2 H1 U1 R11
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Earth Readers are Agarthan priests and diviners of the Will of the Earth. They interpret the ancient carvings found throughout Agartha. They are always consulted when new caverns or mines are opened. They also predict earth tremors and cave-ins.
